templates.name: Clean Refrigerator Coils
templates.description: Remove dust to improve cooling efficiency and prevent overheating.
instructions: Unplug the refrigerator.
Locate coils (usually behind the kick plate or on the back).
Use a coil cleaning brush and vacuum to remove dust and pet hair.
Clean the floor underneath if accessible.
Plug back in.

templates.name: Clean Dishwasher Filter
templates.description: Prevent odors and improve cleaning performance.
instructions: Remove the bottom rack.
Twist and remove the filter assembly.
Rinse under hot water and scrub mesh with a soft brush.
Check the drain area for food debris.
Reinstall filter securely.

templates.name: Calibrate Oven Temperature
templates.description: Ensure your oven cooks at the correct temperature.
instructions: Place an oven thermometer in the center rack.
Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
Wait 20 minutes after preheat beeps.
Check thermometer reading. If off by >15°F, consult manual to adjust offset.

name: Laundry Care
description: Prevent fires and floods in the laundry room.

templates.name: Clean Dryer Vent
templates.description: Remove lint buildup to prevent fire hazards.
instructions: Disconnect dryer from power and vent duct.
Vacuum lint from the back of the dryer.
Use a vent cleaning brush kit to clean the duct to the outside.
Check exterior hood for blockages.
Reconnect and run on air fluff to clear loose lint.

templates.name: Inspect Washer Hoses
templates.description: Check for bulges or cracks to prevent flooding.
instructions: Look behind the washer at supply hoses.
Check for bubbles, cracks, or corrosion on fittings.
Ensure connections are tight.
Replace rubber hoses every 5 years (consider steel braided).
